name: api_rendering_LineRenderer
description: The line renderer is used to draw free-floating lines in 3D space.

properties.name: alignment
properties.description: Select whether the line will face the camera, or the orientation of the Transform Component.

properties.name: applyActiveColorSpace
properties.description: Set whether colors will be converted appropriately before being passed to the GPU when using Linear Rendering.

properties.name: colorGradient
properties.description: Set the color gradient describing the color of the line at various points along its length.

properties.name: endColor
properties.description: Set the color at the end of the line.

properties.name: endWidth
properties.description: Set the width at the end of the line.

properties.name: generateLightingData
properties.description: Configures a line to generate Normals and Tangents. With this data, Scene lighting can affect the line via Normal Maps and the Unity Standard Shader, or your own custom-built Shaders.

properties.name: loop
properties.description: Connect the start and end positions of the line together to form a continuous loop.

properties.name: maskInteraction
properties.description: Specifies how the LineRenderer interacts with SpriteMask.

properties.name: numCapVertices
properties.description: Set this to a value greater than 0, to get rounded corners on each end of the line. The default is 0.

properties.name: numCornerVertices
properties.description: Set this to a value greater than 0, to get rounded corners between each segment of the line.

properties.name: positionCount
properties.description: Set/get the number of vertices.

properties.name: shadowBias
properties.description: Apply a shadow bias to prevent self-shadowing artifacts. The specified value is the proportion of the line width at each segment.

properties.name: startColor
properties.description: Set the color at the start of the line.

properties.name: startWidth
properties.description: Set the width at the start of the line.

properties.name: textureMode
properties.description: Choose whether the U coordinate of the line texture is tiled or stretched.

properties.name: textureScale
properties.description: A multiplier for the UV coordinates of the line texture.

properties.name: useWorldSpace
properties.description: If enabled, the lines are defined in world space.

properties.name: widthCurve
properties.description: Set the curve describing the width of the line at various points along its length.

properties.name: widthMultiplier
properties.description: Set an overall multiplier that is applied to the LineRenderer.widthCurve to get the final width of the line.

properties.name: LineRenderer
properties.description: Instead of using this constructor, either use GameObject.AddComponent<LineRenderer>(), or if you have an existing LineRenderer component on a GameObject, use GameObject.GetComponent<LineRenderer>().
